Generated by DocFX

Namespace Mewdeko.Modules.Utility.Services

Classes

AutoPublishService

Provides functionality to automatically publish messages in Discord news channels according to specific rules, including channel, user, and word blacklists.

CommandAliasEqualityComparer

This class provides a way to compare two CommandAlias objects. It implements the IEqualityComparer interface which defines methods to support the comparison of objects for equality.

CommandMapService

Manages the transformation of input commands based on alias mappings, allowing customization of command triggers.

ConverterService

Provides services for converting units and currencies, with automatic updates for currency conversion rates.

DllVersionChecker

Provides functionality to check the version of a DLL file in the application's directory.

InviteService

Service for managing invites. Implements the INService interface.

InviteService.Options

Options for the InviteService commands. Implements the IMewdekoCommandOptions interface.

JoinLeaveLoggerService

Service for logging user join and leave events. Implements the INService interface.

MessageRepeaterService

Manages the scheduling and execution of repeating messages across guilds.

OwoServices

Provides services to "owoify" text inputs, transforming standard text into a whimsical, playful style.

PronounsService

Service for fetching and managing user pronouns from an external API.

Rates

Represents the currency rates for conversion.

RemindService

Manages and executes reminders for users at specified times.

RollCommandService

Service for parsing and processing dice roll commands.

StreamRoleService

Manages stream role assignments based on user streaming status and additional configurable conditions within guilds.

UtilityService

Provides various utility functionalities including message sniping, link previews, reaction management, and URL checking.

VerboseErrorsService

Service for managing verbose error responses for commands.

Structs

RemindService.RemindObject

Represents the details of a reminder, including what the reminder is for and the time until the reminder should occur.
